meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Briefing Room 6ES and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of August 22, 2023 Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Santa Fe Trail Term Sheet
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for Santa Fe Trail at Haskell in partnership with Larkspur Capital, LP.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: The Riviera Apartments Financing
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet and inducing the proposed financing of up to $55,000,000 of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Banyan Flats Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Banyan Flats including the execution of all documentation necessary.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Maple Highline Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Maple Highline including the execution of all documentation necessary.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Bishop 8 Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Bishop 8 including the execution of all documentation necessary.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Coombs Creek Alta Vista Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Coombs Creek Alta Vista including the execution of all documentation necessary.
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.

financial_items.description: Proposed financing of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments
